public class SaveAndOpenDataSource
extends DatabaseViewer

This class is used to save the data source information for a particular solutionsadapter in an xml file

Author:
Maharajan

Method Detail

saveDatasourceToFile

public void saveDatasourceToFile(TreeObject[] dataSourceObj,
                                 com.rrs.corona.sasadapter.DataSourceType dataSourceType)
This method is used to save the datasource inforamtion and populate the schema this schema will responsible for storing the database information in an xml file

Parameters:
dataSourceObj - This is of type array of TreeObject this will contain the datasource in the tree
dataSourceType - This is of type DataSourceType will be used to store the datasource information

saveTableList

private void saveTableList(TreeObject[] tableObj,
                           com.rrs.corona.sasadapter.DataSourceType dataSourceType)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
This method is used to store the table list present under the datasource in the tree will be populated in the schema object and will be saved in the xml file

Parameters:
tableObj - This is of type array of TreeObject will contains the tables
dataSourceType - This is of type DataSourceType this will store the informations about the tables
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - It will throws JAXBException

saveFieldList

private void saveFieldList(TreeObject[] fieldObj,
                           com.rrs.corona.sasadapter.TableList tableList)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
This method is used to store the column information present under each table and also the mapping information with the dataobject will also be stored in the xml file

Parameters:
fieldObj - This is of type array of TreeObject which contains the fields
tableList - This is of type TableList schema object used to store the field information and also the mapping information in the xml file
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - It will throws JAXBException

openDataSourceFromFile

public void openDataSourceFromFile(TreeParent dsNode,
                                   com.rrs.corona.sasadapter.DataSourceType dataSourceType)
This method is used to open the datasource information from the xml file and populate the details in the tree. This tree will a data source tree item

Parameters:
dsNode - This is of type TreeParent which will have the child as data source tree item
dataSourceType - This is of type DataSourceType which will have the data source information this is actually a schema object

openTableList

private void openTableList(TreeParent dsName,
                           java.util.List listObj)
This method is used to populate the table information in the tree from the xml file add those items under the newly created data source tree

Parameters:
dsName - This is of type TreeParent which will have the tables as children
listObj - This of type List which will have the list of TableList schema objects

openFieldList

private void openFieldList(TreeParent tableName,
                           java.util.List listObj)
This method is used to populate the field information in the tree form the xml file add those items under the newly created table tree

Parameters:
tableName - This is of tyoe Treeparent which will have the fields as children
listObj - This of type List which will have the list of FieldList schema objects
